Coping at the beginning
• It is best if you are moving 
about during labour. You 
can	drink	fluids	and	may	
find	isotonic	drinks	(sports	
drinks) help keep your energy 
levels up. You can also have 
a light snack, although 
many women don’t feel 
very hungry and some feel 
nauseated.
• As the contractions get 
stronger and more painful, 
you can try relaxation and 
breathing exercises. Your 
birthing partner can help by 
doing them with you.
• Your birthing partner can
